div.p: Oh lots of things! I think I was quite into art so I think at one point I thought I might like to be an architect or something like that but
I think you know as you get older reality sort of sets in a little bit and you sort of think what can I get into and what can I take in and learn
and what can I do with that and I think when I left school I went and got into admin because it was something my mum did and I did like the idea
of it so I went and did that and then got an apprenticeship and then went right through the apprenticeship and now
I've started here after my apprenticeship
